newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norsk Hydro cuts magnesium price to Europe.
newsitem.headline: Norsk Hydro cuts magnesium price to Europe.

text.p: Norsk Hydro ASA said on Tuesday it would cut its European producer price for pure magnesium to 6.30 marks per kilogramme from 6.55 marks/kg.
The new price will be effective from September 6.

"The change reflects continuing downward pressure on prices for pure magnesium arising from weak demand in its principal markets, namely aluminium alloying and steel desulphurisation," Hydro Magnesium said in a statement.
Free market prices had fallen by more than 25 percent in the last 12 months to the minimum level permitted by the definitive anti-dumping measures taken by the European Commission, the company said.
The European producer price for alloy ingot was unchanged at 5.55 marks/kg.
